dcterms:description: The Argoverse 1 motion forecasting dataset has more than 30K driving scenarios collected in Miami and Pittsburgh, consisting of a road graph and trajectories of multiple agents.
dcterms:title: Argoverse 1

dcterms:description: Argoverse 2 collects longer and more complicated driving scenarios in six cities, providing a next-generation dataset for self-driving perception and forecasting.
dcterms:title: Argoverse 2
